description:
A southern ruler named Yuriwaka is abandoned on an island. An old man brings home a boy named "Fire Man". A stingy priest tells the children at his temple that his snacks are made of poison, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Minister Yuriwaka / The Fire Man / The Priest and the Boy and the Poisonous Mochi
Yuriwaka Daijin / Hi Otoko / Oshou to Kozou no Mochi wa Doku
百合若大臣 / 火男 / 和尚と小僧の餅は毒
